name: Kalaupapa store prices; penalty
text: §326-28  Kalaupapa store prices; penalty.  It shall be unlawful for the department of health or its agents to sell or offer for sale any merchandise at the Kalaupapa store at prices exceeding the actual cost thereof, free on board steamer or any other means of transportation at Honolulu.  Any person violating this section shall be fined $25 and in addition thereto shall, in the discretion of the department, be subject to removal from office. [L 1927, c 245, §§1, 2; am imp L 1931, c 139, §5; am imp L 1933, c 118, §1; RL 1935, §1166; RL 1945, §2429; am L 1949, c 80, §1(4); RL 1955, §50-30; am L Sp 1959 2d, c 1, §19; HRS §326-28]
